title: Vaccination in Europe: Attitude of the Anthroposophical Society
author: Olga Shimanskaya
cleaned_text: Vaccination in Europe: Attitude of the Anthroposophical Society The article is devoted to a relevant topic - the progress and readiness of the Europe-an society for vaccination against coronavirus and the public discussion that unfolded in European countries regarding the pace of the vaccine campaign, the safety of vaccines certified by the European Medicines
